DOC.brief_summary: This study assess preliminary parameter safety efficacy single dose BCT197 patient Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) exacerbation .
DOC.brief_title: Safety & Efficacy BCT197A2201 Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Patients Presenting With Exacerbation
DOC.criteria: Patients COPD ( Stage II IV ) COPD exacerbation . Smoking history 10 pack year . Females must childbearing potential . Use steroids last 30 day calcium channel blocker last 48 hour . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
